text: Her acting career coudn't be going any better, but behind closed doors, is Margot's personal life under strain? Margot Robbie should be on cloud nine, right? She ’ s just been nominated for a Best Actress Oscar for her role in I, Tonya ( a film that also scooped three Golden Globes nominations and one win ), every stylist and make - up artist on the planet wants to work with her, and there are major rumours she could become the new face of Chanel ( having worn the designer at both the Golden Globes and the 90th Annual Academy Awards Nominee Luncheon ). Yep, 2018 looks good on Margot. But huge career success aside, we ’ ve heard there ’ s trouble brewing at home, with tensions rising between Margot, 27,
